school.name: Consudec, “Septimo Walsh”, V5. Capital Bs.As. Argentina

company.name: Embassy of the Republic of Argentina in the Netherlands

profile_positions.company: Embassy of the Republic of Argentina in the Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Procurement and General Administrative Department
•	Tendering process. 
•	Processing of potential supplier’s prequalification information.
•	Handling agreements, contracts and pricing.
•	Dealing with companies for final process.
•	Assist with bid evaluations.
•	File and update contact information of suppliers.
•	Check frequently the levels of office supplies and place appropriate orders.
•	Organize task and duties
•	Purchase, receive and store the office supplies
•	Manage inventory

Commercial and Cultural Department
•	Participates in the organization, preparation and development of events.
•	Excel and word processing, to prepare reports, documents, catalogs, flyers, etc.
•	Perform procedures regarding lodging and transportation. 
•	Researching markets to identify opportunities for events.
•	Producing detailed proposals for events such as suppliers, legal obligations, 
staffing and budgets).

Personal and General administrative Assistant
•	Providing telephone support.
•	Manage the daily/weekly/monthly agenda.
•	Organize and schedule meetings and appointments.
•	Develop and maintain filing system.
•	General support including mailing, scanning, faxing and copying to the staff.
•	Producing documents, briefing papers, reports and presentations.
•	Assist in resolving any administrative problems.
•	Support other departments
•	Maintenance webpage.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant
